translations.At Geounity, we value your privacy. This: At Geounity, we value your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and protect your personal information when you use our Service.
translations.We may collect personally identifiable i: We may collect personally identifiable information, such as your name, email address, location, and community preferences.
translations.Data about how you interact with our Ser: Data about how you interact with our Service, including surveys, debates, and projects.
translations.Technical information about the device y: Technical information about the device you use to access the Service, such as IP address, browser type, and operating system.
To provide and improve our Service.
translations.To personalize your experience on the pl: To personalize your experience on the platform.
translations.To communicate with you about updates, p: To communicate with you about updates, promotions, and news.
translations.To analyze the use of the Service to dev: To analyze the use of the Service to develop new features.
translations.We do not sell your personal information: We do not sell your personal information to third parties. We may share aggregated and anonymized data with partners for analysis and improvements.
translations.We may disclose your information if requ: We may disclose your information if required by law or to protect our rights.
translations.We implement appropriate security measur: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.
translations.We retain your personal information whil: We retain your personal information while your account is active or as necessary to provide you with the Service. We may also retain and use your information to comply with legal obligations, resolve disputes, and enforce our agreements.
translations.Depending on your location, you may have: Depending on your location, you may have rights regarding your personal information, including:
translations.We use cookies and similar technologies: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience on the Service. You can manage your cookie preferences through your browser settings.
translations.We may update this Privacy Policy from t: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will post any changes on this page and, if they are significant, we will notify you through the Service or via email.
translations.If you have any questions or concerns ab: If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy, contact us at
translations.Geounity is a platform for building comm: Geounity is a platform for building communities.

translations.(Service). By using our Service, you ag: (Service). By using our Service, you agree to comply with these Terms. If you do not agree, do not use the Service.
translations.You must be at least 13 years old to use: You must be at least 13 years old to use our Service.
translations.You are responsible for maintaining the: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and password. Notify us immediately if you detect any unauthorized use of your account.
translations.You must not use the Service for illegal: You must not use the Service for illegal, defamatory, offensive activities or those that infringe on the rights of others.
translations.You are responsible for the content you: You are responsible for the content you post on Geounity. You must not post content that violates laws, third-party rights, or is inappropriate.
translations.By posting content, you grant us a world: By posting content, you grant us a worldwide, non-exclusive, royalty-free license to use, reproduce, and display such content on the platform.
translations.All intellectual property rights in the: All intellectual property rights in the Service and its content belong to Geounity or its licensors. No rights are granted to you over any trademarks, logos, or other copyright-protected material.
translations.We reserve the right to modify or discon: We reserve the right to modify or discontinue, temporarily or permanently, the Service with or without notice. We will not be liable to you or any third party for such modifications or interruptions.
translations.We may terminate or suspend your access: We may terminate or suspend your access to the Service if you violate these Terms. Upon termination, you will cease all use of the Service.
translations.Geounity shall not be liable for any ind: Geounity shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising from the use or inability to use the Service.
translations.You agree to indemnify and hold Geounity: You agree to indemnify and hold Geounity harmless from any claims, damages, obligations, losses, liabilities, costs, or debts arising from your use of the Service or your violation of these Terms.
translations.These Terms shall be governed and constr: These Terms shall be governed and construed in accordance with the laws of the country where Geounity is registered, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.
